jobDescription: The Charles River Pollution Control District, a medium-sized wastewater treatment facility, is seeking a candidate for the position of Operator. The position requires a minimum of a Massachusetts Wastewater Operator Grade 4 Licenses or the ability to obtain one within six months of hire. Responsibilities include but are not limited to: daily oversight and operation of plant equipment and working in confined spaces. Weekend, holiday shifts and on-call are required. Hourly rate based on experience. Please direct resumes to Janice Healy.
